column1: Arrr; Arrr...The Sea sank the Wicked Tide... *murmur* *murmur*
No! This is a gift for my daughter.
I promised her a gift and I shall deliver my sweet child this puppy’s soul trapped inside the whiskey bottle...
Here ye go wee Wizard. Take this pupper back to me cap'n 'n tell 'im Joe’s sorry.
I guess th' crazy has got to me... Goodbye... scallywag.
